title: Analyze Multi-Family Investment Property
description: An investor client is interested in a 10-unit apartment building and needs an analysis of its financial performance.

tasks.description: Obtain the property's financial documents: rent roll and trailing 12-months P&L statement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acquires the necessary financial documents from the listing agent.

tasks.description: Analyze the documents to calculate the Net Operating Income (NOI) and Capitalization Rate (Cap Rate).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the NOI and the asking Cap Rate.

tasks.description: Generate a pro-forma analysis and summary report for the investor.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report detailing the property's financial metrics and potential ROI is created.
